item.description:
Come celebrate my 30th birthday with me in style at two awesome bars for dinner and dancing! One is a new favorite - Landsdowne Bar & Grill, and the other is a classic dancing hot spot - BAR.

We enjoyed the happy hour that we had at Lansdowne, and the food is excellent! I love dancing, and Bar has a great dance floor. It has awesome pizza and great drinks (Daphne highly recommends the Macintosh appletini)!

The night starts at 8pm at Lansdowne (179 Crown Street) and we walk to Bar (254 Crown Street) before 10 pm to beat the cover charge and get the 2$ drink specials. The 2$ drink specials include well drinks and domestic bottled beers. The drink special runs from 10pm to 11pm.

Come and party with me and dance the night away!

PS - Please Drink responsibly (I want you to make it home safely after partying with me).
*No cards or gifts, please...Just hugs!
item.name: Celebrate Anita's 30th B-Day with Dinner and Dancing!
